abstract: Former Marine Corps recruit Thomas Weaver sheds light on hazing practices and widespread abuse by drill instructors experienced during boot camp at Third Recruit Training Battalion in Parris Island, SC, including hazing that led to suicide of Muslim recruit; ongoing Marine Corps investigation has led to removal of three leaders and implicated 20 Marines.

lead_paragraph: A top-notch recruit who was expelled from the Marines said his superiors told trainees to lie about punching, kicking and choking by drill instructors.
